summary: An ordinance authorizing the Puget Sounds Traction, Light and Power Company, its successors and assigns, to discontinue operation of its street railway system, and to surrender its franchise on those portions of Route No. 6, and Route No. 18, of Ordinance No. 5874, of the City of Seattle embraced within the following locations: on Stewart Street, from Sixth Avenue to Eighth Avenue; on Eighth Avenue from Stewart Street to Lenora Street; and on Seventh Avenue, from Olive Street to Stewart Street.
